name: Npm
natural_language_description: 这是 Npm 节点。主要用于: Consume NPM registry API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: package

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getMany
available_options: Get All (值: getMany) - Returns all the dist-tags for a package
Update (值: update) - Update a the dist-tags for a package

packageName.name: packageName
packageName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Package Name | (必填项)

packageVersion.name: packageVersion
packageVersion.natural_language_description: 参数名: Package Version | (必填项)

query.name: query
query.description: The query text used to search for packages
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The query text used to search for packages | (必填项)

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 10

offset.name: offset
offset.natural_language_description: 参数名: Offset | 作用: Offset to return results from | 默认值: 0

distTagName.name: distTagName
distTagName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Distribution Tag Name | 默认值: latest | (必填项)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
